title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competency: Enhancing Learner Autonomy in Digital Game-Based Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital game operation skills and elementary social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply higher-order thinking skills (critical analysis, evaluation) by generating and analyzing self-directed questions in digital game-based discussion activities.
Learners can develop a self-directed learning plan by revising their learning strategies based on peer feedback in asynchronous group discussions.
Learners can write discussion posts proposing solutions to social issues using data obtained from game-based simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
